column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: mma nntwuw m’enyim wɔ ebufuw mu: Nkyii so mma nntsea me wɔ w’ebufuhyew mu."

column2: "Na w’egyen menaba awowɔ me aka mu
column3: Na wo nsa edwir mo do."

column2: "Osian w’ebufuhyew ntsi ahoɔdzen bi nnyi mo honam mu; Nkyii so osian mo bɔn ntsi apɔwmudzen bi nnyi me mbiew mu."
"Na m’emumuyɛ emunam m’etsifi: Ayɛ mo do dur dɛ adzesoadze durdur."
"Osian mo nkwaseasɛm ntsi
"Mo mu akom na matɔ famu koraa; Adzekyee nyinara medze awerɛhow nenam."
"Na m’asen mu hyehye me; Na ahoɔdzen bi nnyi mo honam mu."
"Matɔ bahaw na mebubu posoposo: Makeka mu dzendzen wɔ m’akoma n’ahomtsew ntsi:"
"EWURADZE
column3: m’ahwehwɛdze nyinara wɔ w’enyim; Na mo nkrumsi nnhuntsa wo."

column2: "M’akoma tow hwim hwim
column3: m’ahoɔdzen apa: M’enyiwa ne kan mpo
column4: no so efi mo ho kɔ."

column2: "M’adɔfo na me m’anyɛnkofo atwe hɔnho efi me haw ho; Na m’ebusuafo so mpo gyina ekyirekyir."
"Hɔn so a wɔrohwehwɛ mo wu no esua me mfir; Na hɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔn no ka ebususɛm
column3: Na wɔdwendwen ndaadaasɛm ho adzekyee nyina."

column2: "Na emi dze metse dɛ otsitsifo a menntse asɛm; Na metse dɛ mmum a ommbue n’ano."
"Nyew
column3: metse dɛ nyimpa a ɔnntse asɛm

column2: "Na ɔwo
column4: na m’enyi da wo do: Ao

column2: "Na mese dɛ
column3: Mma mma wonsi me atwetwe: Sɛ m’anan patser a
column4: mma mma wɔnnhyehyɛ hɔnho wɔ mo do."

column2: "Na emi dze mereyɛ mahwe ase
column3: Na me yaw wɔ m’enyim daa."

column2: "Na mebɛka m’emumuyɛ akyerɛ: Mibedzi mo bɔn ho yaw."
"Na m’atamfo dze
column4: na hɔn ho yɛ dzen: Na hɔn a wɔtan me gyan no adɔɔ so."

column2: "Hɔn so a wɔdze bɔn tua papa kaw no
"Ao EWURADZE
"Yɛ ntsɛm bɔboa me
